Class ConfigurationManager

java.lang.Object
com.shiroyama.chess2.utils.ConfigurationManager
public class ConfigurationManager extends Object
Represents the configuration manager for the chess game. This class is responsible for managing and persisting application settings, including chess piece stats (HP and attack rate) and graphical preferences (window size, VSync, fullscreen mode).

      Retrieves the HP value for the specified chess PieceType.

      Returns:
      the HP value for the specified PieceType, or 1 if the value is not found

      Returns:
